definition: pattra palm tree (loan from Sanskrit, Corypha umbraculifera), whose leaves were used as paper substitute for Buddhist sutras
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
Talipot palm (Corypha umbraculifera), whose leaves were used as writing media

sentences.english: When he was 15, and was working in a Church as an assistance organist, Ludwig was practically supporting the family.
sentences.chinese: 贝多芬15岁时就在教堂担任助理风琴师，挣钱养家。

sentences.english: We've sort of gone from the Beach Boys to Beethoven here.
sentences.chinese: 我们好像从沙滩男孩一下跳到了贝多芬。

sentences.english: So how does Beethoven go about making the Ode to Joy joyful?What does he do here?
sentences.chinese: 贝多芬是怎样让欢乐颂变得那么欢乐的呢？

sentences.english: But they did not have patience for this, nor him to read their lips.
sentences.chinese: 贝多芬对此没有耐心，也不去看对方的口型。

sentences.english: Beethoven String Quartet, Op. 18, No. 2, final Movement.
sentences.chinese: 贝多芬弦乐四重奏，作品18号，第二首，末乐章。

sentences.english: Berlioz compared him favorably to Beethoven and Gluck.
sentences.chinese: 柏辽兹认为他并不亚于贝多芬和格鲁克。

sentences.english: In his youth he fell under the influence of Beethoven.
sentences.chinese: 他年轻时受到贝多芬的影响。

sentences.english: Beethoven Sonata for Piano and Violin No. 4,5,9
sentences.chinese: 贝多芬第4，5，9号钢琴与小提琴奏鸣曲。

sentences.english: To the melody of Moonlight Sonata of Beethoven.
sentences.chinese: 到贝多芬《月光奏鸣曲》旋律畅想。

sentences.english: Journey back into Beethoven's mind with the Borromeo String Quartet.
sentences.chinese: 博罗美奥弦乐四重奏将会为我们进行贝多芬解码。

sentences.english: And Damisch chose Beethoven's A. N. S Appassionato Sonata for his a reason.
sentences.chinese: 达弥施选用了贝多芬的《热情奏鸣曲》只有一个理由。

sentences.english: My recon squad had engaged Saddam's army in a small Bedouin encampment.
sentences.chinese: 我的侦察班在贝多因的一个小营地与萨达姆军队交战。

sentences.english: This movement is the most popular of Beethoven’s Symphony No. 7.
sentences.chinese: 这首乐章是贝多芬《第七号交响曲》中最受欢迎的。

sentences.english: Vicki had brought some Beethoven, which I put on the CD player.
sentences.chinese: 维姬随身带来贝多芬的唱片，我把它放进了CD机。

sentences.english: I am looking for a record of Beethovens Sixth Symphony.
sentences.chinese: 我正在找贝多芬第六交响曲的唱片。

sentences.english: They will perform Beethoven's Eroica at the concerto tonight.
sentences.chinese: 他们将在今晚的音乐会上演奏贝多芬的《英雄》。

definition: Ur (Sumerian city c. 4500 BC in modern Iraq)
Werther, opera by Jules Massenet/Werther, German masculine given name
Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
Aceh province of Indonesia in northwest Sumatra/Aceh sultanate 16th-19th century
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
Pali, language of Theravad Pali canon/Barry (name)/Gareth Barry (1981-), English footballer
